positive_examples: This is an example of territorial war.
The territorial war demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed territorial war in this context.
A typical case of territorial war would involve these features.
The concept of territorial war applies here.
A war fought primarily over disputed territory, borders, or territorial claims between nations.
negative_examples: This is an example of civil war, not territorial war.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CivilWar, or other types of War

definition: Armed conflict fought primarily over control of geographic territory.
